PW Skills


PW Skills is a dynamic educational platform that offers a wide range of online courses designed to equip learners with essential skills in various domains such as programming, data science, digital marketing, and more.
The platform is known for its comprehensive, industry-relevant curriculum and a learner-centric approach, making education accessible and affordable to everyone. Each course is carefully curated by experts in the field, ensuring that the content is up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies.
PW Skills provides interactive learning experiences through live sessions, hands-on projects, and practical assignments that help learners build real-world skills. The platform also offers personalized mentorship and career support, including resume building, interview preparation, and job placement assistance, which helps learners transition smoothly from education to employment. With a strong focus on quality education and learner success, PW Skills is empowering thousands of individuals to enhance their skills and achieve their career goals, making it a preferred choice for skill development and career advancement in today's competitive job market.

Founder


Alakh Pandey is the founder and CEO of Physics Wallah (PW) Skills, an edtech platform that aims to democratize education in India. Pandey started PW in 2016 as a YouTube channel to teach physics for the Joint Entrance Examinations (JEE). In 2020, he partnered with Prateek Maheshwari, the co-founder of PW, to launch the platform.

PW's mission is to provide quality education at affordable prices to every child in India. The platform offers live and recorded classes, exam preparation, and progress tracking. PW has over 15 million students on its app, more than 100 city locations, and 120 Vidyapeeth centers. In 2022, PW became a unicorn and claimed to have over 27 lakh paid students and 1 crore app downloads.

PW Skills has recently partnered with the NSDC to provide affordable upskilling, reskilling, and skilling opportunities to learners. The company also acquired iNeuron Intelligence for Rs 250 crore in 2022 to expand its offerings in the upskilling space.


"Believe in your potential. It is the power within you that can change your destiny, no matter how tough the journey seems."-**Alakh Pandey**
